name: Radisson Blu Plaza Delhi

reviews.text: The Radisson Blu Plaza Delhi is located just outside the Indira Gandhi International Airport, and is happy to supply complementary, personal shuttle service upon pre-arrangement. Immediate access to a large, luxurious hotel on arrival in the middle of the night after an inter-continental flight is welcome and therapeutic. The hotel is as modern and solid as the newly constructed terminal building at the airport. I did not know until morning that four levels of vehicular traffic were situated outside my hotel window, the soundproofing was so good. The full services of the hotel include a wonderful breakfast buffet. The hotel room was large, well-furnished, and filled with welcome features. This is better than your everyday hotel, but it fills a solid set of needs extremely well.
reviews.title: Welcome luxury

reviews.text: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel many times now, and it has always been a pleasure. The hotel is very pleasant, and the rooms are comfortable, and the food is very good. What we like most about this hotel is its staff - they are very caring, always available, extremely attentive, and makes you feel welcome and important. The only one thing to complain about is that the temperatures in the rooms cannot be easily controlled, and when it gets too cool inside, one can only switch off the A/C. The hotel is situated very near the airport, and that's convenient, but even for shopping, there are good malls in Vasant Kunj, which is only 15 minutes away. Getting to the centre of town can be a long drive, and don't attempt it at rush hour. The hotel is also a very good venue for a meeting.
reviews.title: VERY GOOD PRACTICAL HOTEL

reviews.text: hotel is situated approx 45 minutes drive from the airport, car pick up is available. The rooms are great with all comfort that a frequent business traveler needs. very clean with nice view. Complimentary fast internet, rain shower with warm water that comes in a second, nice thick towels. The breakfast area is luxurious with a large variety of juices, fresh fruit, breads of all kinds, sweets. The check in process went very quick, however the check out took quite some time: 2 staff were occupied and getting the invoice was a pain. The price is high, but it is a 5 star hotel not far from the airport.
reviews.title: Business Hotel with vary spacious rooms

reviews.text: We stayed here as a stopover on our way back home from a trip to Agra to see the Taj Mahal. After a very long and uncomfortable drive from Agra to Delhi this hotel experience was very pleasant.
reviews.title: Great Airport Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is modern and well kept. Rooms were great and wifi was strong. My only very small room complaint was that the water could have been just a little hotter in the bathroom shower. Anyway, upon check-in we were immediately given membership to the rewards program (without asking), which was nice as I always enjoy collecting points for my hotel stays. The food was great at the cafe -- we ate dinner and breakfast the next morning there. There was a lot of variety and the food (continental and indian) was good. Also appreciated the very close proximity to the airport, so no hassle there to catch our flight the next day.
reviews.title: We always stay here because its closest to the airport .

reviews.text: After a long trip to India from the States, I had the pleasure to recover from the trip at this lovely hotel. It is definitely a corporate, American style hotel, and expensive, but I was thrilled with the room, the luxurious bathroom, and the super helpful and kind staff.
reviews.title: an oasis of calm

reviews.text: We stayed for one night on our way to Kashmir. The whole experience from start to finish was exceptional. The room was stunning and just what we needed after a long journey. The breakfast buffet was a feast with everything you could imagine. I was most impressed by the service and friendliness of the staff. I will most definitely be back when I am in Delhi again! It is literally a 10 min drive from the airport too which is a huge plus with the Delhi traffic.
reviews.title: Great airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here last week for one night. The hotel is beautiful, the rooms are large and very luxurious.
reviews.title: WOW amazing airport hotel

reviews.text: The manager checked us in, and took us to our room. He then contacted the Leela Palace on our behalf and had our bags delivered to the hotel within the hour. We had left bags at Leela while on a 3 week trek.
reviews.title: Nice facilities but lousy P.R.

reviews.text: The bar was fantastic. we ended up eating some of the tastiest Chineese food off of the bar menu for dinner, and it was perfect for very tired travellers.
reviews.title: Doormen nowhere to be found!

reviews.text: I stayed here for a partial night after arriving on an international flight in the middle of the night. The drive to the hotel took less than 30 minutes in traffic.
reviews.title: Great breakfast buffet and good exercise facility

reviews.text: The best part of this hotel was the excellent breakfast buffet. Truly outstanding. I also found the exercise facility to be very good by Asian standards. Plenty of machines, free weights, and treadmills. Some of the treamills look out through windows into the circle drive, so absorbing some sunlight is possible when you're trying to make the timezone adjustment while on the treadmill.
reviews.title: Luxury hotel, excellent staff, great food, convenient location

reviews.text: The lobby and rooms are nice, although the facility overall is typical of India in that there are scrapes and dents in walls, brush marks on the trim from painting, etc. Overall lack of attention to detail in the maintenance work. That's typical in India but certainly keeps this hotel from being compared to a true luxury hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent, convenient airport location

reviews.text: I found the glass bathroom wall a nice touch. Just be careful turning on the shower water, as the shower head if pointed in a "neutral" position will douse the entire sink area with heavy water.
reviews.title: What's With Those Glass-Wall Bathrooms?

reviews.text: My room was spotlessly clean and I had no trouble sleeping.
reviews.title: Very comfortable and well appointed hotel with excellent food

reviews.text: Nice Place to stay in .....Relaxing place to stay in.....Good warm reception.....good food and service........Rooms were cozy and clean....nice view........Awesome experience.......Fast check in and check out......reallly.......happy to help customer care service........100% customer satisfaction....they do provide........
reviews.title: Excellent Property

reviews.text: Very well located Hotel for the convenience of Guests coming from abroad . Radisson makes sure one is pampered to the best proved one pays the Price .But it is Worth the Price .Food is Excellent too.Dr Bhalla K.
reviews.title: Hassle Free Stay.

reviews.text: Now that Delhi has arrived with it's endless highways, toll roads, shopping malls, Metro and plush Hotels one thing that has been constant for over a decade has been this superb 5 star hotel. It has been out and out the standard for luxury hotels in New Delhi.
reviews.title: The Business..

reviews.text: It is located just a stone's throw away from IGI Airport and the National Highway. It has always endeared itself to the business traveller for it's incredible luxury and grandeur.
reviews.title: Good hotel, Poor front desk service

reviews.text: It may not be in the heart of the City but that does not concern those who need close proximity to the International Airport.
reviews.title: All round excellent - truly amazing service

description: Radisson Blu Plaza Delhi is located within 4-5 Km of the International Airport. It offers a feel-at-home business or leisure stay with easy access to shopping and business districts of both Delhi and Gurgaon. Designed for travelers who want to be in a central location, Radisson Blu Plaza Delhi has 261 beautifully appointed guest rooms, including 140 Superior Rooms, 64 Premium Rooms, 35 Business Class Rooms, 7 Executive Suites, 14 Deluxe Suites and a Presidential Suite. Contemporary and modern in setting, all rooms offer elegant décor and luxurious amenities. Guests can savour the critically acclaimed cuisine, enjoy top-of-the-line service, relax at the Savannah bar and de-stress at the R- The spa. The Radisson’s theme-based spa suites are a perfect wellness retreat - a rejuvenating haven to restore energies, detox and unwind. Spread over an area of 20,000 sq ft at three levels, the spa offers the right blend of Asian traditions and European therapies. Radisson Blu Plaza Delhi is ideally suited for business travelers and leisure from across the globe.
